meanings.definition: The quality of being worthy of note or attention.
meanings.sent1: Her noteworthiness in the class discussion made her stand out.
meanings.sent2: The noteworthiness of his achievements was recognized by everyone.
meanings.sent3: The noteworthiness of the cat wearing a hat was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His noteworthiness in the field of science shone like a bright star.
meanings.sent5: The noteworthiness of the ancient artifact captured everyone's interest.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being notable or remarkable.
meanings.sent1: The noteworthiness of the painting drew many admirers.
meanings.sent2: His noteworthiness in the community was well-deserved.
meanings.sent3: The noteworthiness of the talking dog was quite surprising.
meanings.sent4: Her noteworthiness in the music industry was like a beacon of talent.
meanings.sent5: The noteworthiness of the discovery left everyone in awe.
